value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Wh...where are we?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|This is the realm of fantasy...the
dream beneath dreams...$k$pDream-King Freyr lives here!$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Oh, wow! This is...him?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|King Freyr... King Freyr?$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|...He's sleeping. But that's normal!
As the Dream-King, he's always
sleeping—and dreaming!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|So, then...are we to wait for him
to wake? If we want to speak with
him, I mean...$k$p$Sbs5000|$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|No need...young mortal...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Is...is he talking in his sleep?!$k$p$Sbs150|$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Within dreams...all things are
possible.$k$pBut you are here with a purpose.
Allow me to answer your question.$k$pTo wake from this dream...you will
need this.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We need...a horn?$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|It is the horn Gullinkambi. Its tones,
when sounded, will rouse you from
your slumber.$k$pPicture the world outside the dream,
and wish to return. Then, sound a
blast on the horn.$k$pDo that, and your time of awakening
will be at hand.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Then we'll all be able to wake up!
Let's go already!$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Wait. The time and place to sound
the horn...is neither here nor now.$k$pFirst...dökkálfar have sneaked into
Ljósálfheimr, the realm of dreams.$k$pTheir presence is corrupting. You
must remove them before the horn
will sound.$k$pThe horn will not sound outside the
bounds of Ljósálfheimr either. This
is the only way.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|We can handle that, King Freyr!
After all, I'm a ljósálfar, so I know
my way around Ljósálfheimr.$k$pWe'll teach those dökkálfar a lesson
for spreading all those terrible
nightmares in our home!$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|There are two dökkálfar making their
way through Ljósálfheimr... Peony
can lead you to them.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Thank you, Dream-King Freyr.$k$pNow, I have one final thing to ask...
It's about a friend of ours...$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Ah. Of course. You seek knowledge
of $Nu's location.$k$p...Unfortunately, that is one thing
I do not know.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|R-really? How can it be that not even
you know, King Freyr...$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Some things are beyond even me.
Your friend is one such mystery...
This $Nu...$k$pHowever, you needn't worry over
them. If you can drive out the
dökkálfar and blow the horn...$k$pI believe all of you, including your
friend, will return home to the realm
of your waking lives.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Then there's only one thing to do!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|That's right! Let's settle things with
those dökkálfar—and get them out
of Ljósálfheimr for good!$k$p

$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Good morning! Time to get up!
Let's get ready to set out.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Mmrrgh... Is everyone up?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I'm awake, I'm awake... Er, I suppose
this is still a dream, so I'm not truly
awake, but, well...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Yes. It's complicated. But if we can
wake up from this dream, we'll be
back in Askr!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Hmm... I wonder where we might
find those dökkálfar... This way?
...That way, maybe? Oh, I know!$k$pFollow me, everyone! I have a feeling
the dökkálfar are this way!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|A-are you sure?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Don't worry, Anna.
We can trust her!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Yes! We're on the right track. Let's
keep heading this way!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Right behind you!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It seems this is our only way forward,
so we haven't much choice...$k$p$WmMPID_フード,ch00_29_Hood_N_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|W-was that $Nu?!$k$p$WmMPID_フード,ch00_29_Hood_N_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|W-wait! Where are you? How can we
reach you, $Nu?
...$Nu?!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What's wrong, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Just now, as we passed through that
thicket... I thought... I thought I saw
$Nu...$k$pNo, I'm sure of it... Our eyes met, but
$Nu disappeared.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|How strange... Coming to us would
normally be the first thing
$Nu would do...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You're right... Nothing makes sense
here in this dream realm...$k$p$Sbs150|
